content: {"locationId": "9664", "organizationId": "7853", "name": "Loveland Food Share No-Cost Market", "address1": "2600 N Lincoln Ave", "address2": "", "city": "Loveland", "state": "CO", "zipCode": "80538", "country": null, "phone": "", "phoneExt": "", "website": "", "latitude": "40.4194214", "longitude": "-105.0711123", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "", "features": "Air Conditioning", "aboutUs": "", "notes": "Beginning July 1st, the Food Bank for Larimer County will begin serving  only  clients who live within Larimer County. The first time that you shop on or after this date, please be prepared to provide a photo ID and one formal document with your name and address to verify that you live in Larimer County.   Examples of accepted formal documents:   - A utility bill?  - A lease or mortgage statement?  - Vehicle registration?  - Mail from a business or government entity   Examples of photo ID:   - Government-issued ID, including any passport  - Student ID  - Work ID  - Shelter ID  - Employment ID  A reminder that Wednesdays remain designated as accessible hours for older adults 60 and up and those with disabilities.             ", "contactName": "", "contactPhone": "970-493-4477", "contactEmail": "", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "Accepts Walk-Ins, CSFP Program, Grocery / Client Choice, Indoor Service, TEFAP Program", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "Dairy, Diapers, Eggs, Fruits & Vegetables, Household Products, Meat, Pet Food / Supplies, Shelf Stable/Non-Perishable Goods, Toiletries / Hygiene Products", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 65, "regionName": "Food Bank for Larimer County", "logoBlobNameSmall": "3efe14a7-179c-4f50-b2c1-ec8eede64012.png", "website": "https://foodbanklarimer.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Mountain Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "MT", "offsetHours": "-6", "schedules": ["Tuesday 10:00 AM-3:00 PM", "Wednesday 12:00 PM-3:00 PM (Starting Jan. 8, 2025: Accessible hours - only open to older adults 60 and up and those with disabilities)", "Thursday 10:00 AM-3:00 PM", "Friday 10:00 AM-3:00 PM", "Saturday 10:00 AM-3:00 PM"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
